price: Also remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Dhul-Kifl[20] – all were among the best.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ
footnotes: [20] Scholars are of different opinions as to whether Dhul-Kifl was a prophet or only a righteous man.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
